HotelElement.Name: Friday on the Beach Byron Bay

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Friday on the Beach in Byron Bay, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tallow Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Conveniences include minibars and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
